author: nero_eth
content:
Here's a summary of the design space, outlining several different ways we could eliminate the coinbase/proposer pre-charging mechanism:
https://hackmd.io/@Nerolation/BkdlrYGyll
Some approaches are more EL heavy, while others primarily involve the CL.
Curious to hear your thoughts, <@363800010518822915> and <@755590043632140352>
